title: A Wiener-type theorem for arcs in the unit cirle
abstract:
We prove a Wiener-type theorem for arcs in the unit circle which concerns
express the measure of an arc in the unit circle via the measure's Fourier
coefficients. Then we use it to give the Fourier series of the Cantor and to
compute the local dimension of a measure satisfying certain conditions of
Fourier coefficients.
